venue.address_1: Corner of Roby Street & Shore Ave
venue.name: Swift's Neck Beach

item.description:
On most Saturdays between World Tai Chi & Qigong Day and Labor Day, we get together as a group to perform the full Taiji 37-form (Zheng Manqing form) on the beach.  Usually before we start the 37-form, we go through some Qigong routines as a way of loosening up and settling the mind.

If it rains, the meetup will be cancelled so please check here beforehand.

For other beneficial information on Tai Chi & Qigong, please check theSome Reasons to Practice Tai Chi and Qigong page.

No instruction is provided.  To help with Meetup subscription fees, there is a $1 donation.

All are welcome, no matter your experience!

________________________________

The organizer Colman Fink who has been involved with the martial arts for over 40 years, teaches Tai Chi (Taiji), Qigong, Daoyin, Ryukyu Kobujutsu (Kobudo) and Karate Jutsu in Wareham, Middleborough and Plymouth.  His Tai Chi organization is affiliated with the world-wide International Tai Chi Society. He is also the Chief Instructor at Yuishinkai Kobujutsu USA, and a Branch Chief in USA for Yuishinkaiand Ryukyu Kobujutsu Hozon Shinko Kai, both of which are based in Tokyo, Japan.  More information on Colman Fink can be found on his website Martial Arts with Colman. You can also follow his martial arts postings on his Google+ page Martial Arts with Colman.
item.how_to_find_us: Additional information on directions: at the intersection of Roby & Shore, turn right into Shore Ave. About 100 yds along Shore Ave, turn left into the parking lot.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Saturday Tai Chi Meetup at Swift's Neck Beach
